metadata.description: Comprehensive timeline for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Comprehensive rebuild with all evidence integrated

2017-07-26.evidence: JF01 - Shopify Plus email (THE FORENSIC TIME CAPSULE)
2017-07-26.significance: Irrefutable proof of Kayla's role and Daniel's involvement

2025-05-22.event: Kayla Pretorius Death & Evidence Destruction Trigger
2025-05-22.evidence: SF6 (Kayla estate docs), JF01 (preserved Shopify evidence)
2025-05-22.significance: Dual critical event: death triggers appropriation, evidence destruction attempt

2025-05-23.event: First Evidence Package Created (Day After Death)
2025-05-23.significance: Immediate response to evidence destruction (day after death)

2025-06-20.evidence: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot
2025-06-20.significance: Proves Rynette has access to Peter's email (Pete@regima.com) and can impersonate him

2025-07-23.significance: Rynette Farrar identified as subscription owner - controls access to accounting system

2025-08-25.event: Sage Expiry Screenshot - Over 1 Month Without Access
2025-08-25.significance: Account expired 23 July, still expired 25 August (over 1 month denial of access)

entries.description: RegimaSA (Pty) Ltd incorporated as Collections Agent

entries.title: First ReZonance Invoice to RST
entries.description: First invoice from ReZonance to RegimA Skin Treatments for Google GSuite services (R250.80), marking the beginning of business relationship

entries.title: ReZonance Service Expansion
entries.description: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+), substantial increase in service provision and financial exposure
RegimaSA first financial year end (15 months) showing zero revenue, R1,589 loss, minimal activity

entries.title: Financial Year Commencement RST/SLG
entries.description: Financial year commencement for RegimA Skin Treatments and Strategic Logistics, beginning of period covered by trial balance evidence

entries.title: Financial Year Commencement Villa Via
entries.description: Villa Via operates on different financial year, creating complexity in group reporting and enabling profit extraction concealment

entries.title: Multiple Adjusting Journal Entries
entries.description: Significant inter-company cost reallocations: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST
Multiple adjusting journal entries across entities for inter-company cost reallocations

entries.title: Year-End Adjustments and Interest Payment
entries.description: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement, RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment R784K in RST
SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement

entries.title: Villa Via Year-End Profit Extraction
entries.description: Villa Via generates R4.4M monthly rental income with R3.7M profit, Members loan account R22.8M indicating systematic capital extraction
Villa Via financial year-end showing R3.7M profit and R22.8M members loan

entries.title: Bantjies Trial Balance Email Distribution
entries.description: Email from Danie Bantjies with final trial balances to Bernadine Wright, Jax, Peter, Rynette, Daniel for financial statement finalization meeting
Bantjies sends trial balance email to finalize financial statements

entries.title: Bantjies Sends Trial Balance Email to Bernadine Wright
entries.description: Bantjies sends trial balance email to Bernadine Wright for financial statement finalization meeting, demonstrating his control over financial systems and accounting records

entries.title: Adderory Companies Registration - Pre-Planning Phase
entries.description: Rynette's son registered Adderory (Pty) Ltd and Adderory Skin (Pty) Ltd, establishing competing business infrastructure 4 years before fraud escalation. Demonstrates long-term conspiracy planning.

entries.title: ReZonance Opening Balance Debt
entries.description: Opening balance showing substantial accumulated debt to ReZonance (R971,587.93), evidence of unpaid services over extended period

entries.title: First Structured Payment to ReZonance
entries.description: First structured payment to ReZonance (R40,000), attempt to manage debt through partial payments
RegimA WWD paid R157k+ to ReZonance, reducing debt from R85k to R22k (July-December 2022)

entries.title: Kayla Pretorius Murder
entries.description: Murder of Kayla Pretorius, creating estate complications, law enforcement investigation, and family trauma. Estate includes ReZonance debt of R1,035,000.

entries.title: ReZonance Final Balance Persistent Debt
entries.description: Final balance showing persistent debt to ReZonance (R1,035,361.34) despite payment claims, debt continues to grow

entries.title: False Payment Claim #1 to ReZonance
entries.description: RegimA claims payment of R470,000 to ReZonance not reflected in ReZonance records, first documented false payment claim

entries.title: False Payment Claim #2 to ReZonance
entries.description: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34 to ReZonance, escalation of fraudulent payment claims

entries.title: Chantal Letter - Kayla Estate Finalization
entries.description: Chantal delivered letter mentioning Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate.

entries.title: Chantal Delivers Letter About Kayla Estate Finalization
entries.description: Chantal delivers letter to office regarding Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate

entries.title: R900,000 Unauthorized Transfers from RegimA SA
entries.description: Peter made unauthorized transfers of R900,000 from RegimA SA without Daniel's authority as co-director

entries.title: R5.2M SLG Stock Missing & Large Invoice
entries.description: R5.2M SLG stock missing with simultaneous R5.2M invoice from SLG to RST. Stock physically disappeared, same type later supplied by Adderory to RegimA. Systematic asset stripping begins.

entries.title: RegimA SA Revenue Diversion Started
entries.description: Diversion of revenue streams from RegimA SA initiated, marking the beginning of systematic revenue hijacking

entries.title: R5.4M Stock Disappears from Strategic Logistics
entries.description: R5.4M worth of stock physically disappears from Strategic Logistics warehouse. Represents 46% of annual sales, 10x historical adjustment rate. Same stock type later supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) to RegimA.

entries.title: Trust Structure Establishment
entries.description: Foundation for R2.85M+ trust violations established through trust structure manipulation

entries.title: R5.4M Stock Adjustment Processed Without Investigation
entries.description: R5.4M written off as simple 'stock adjustment' without investigation, supporting documentation, or proper authorization. Bantjies as accountant should have investigated 46% loss but did not, demonstrating complicity.

entries.title: Two Years Unallocated Expenses Dumped
entries.description: Rynette and Peter dumped two years' worth of unallocated expenses from all companies into RegimA Worldwide and pressured Daniel to sign off within 12 hours for SARS VAT & Annual Accounts. Daniel used time until June 6th to finalize reports and uncover fraud.

entries.title: Payment Redirection Scheme
entries.description: Part of R4.28M+ financial diversions. Payments redirected from platform owned/paid by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)

entries.title: Bank Account Change Letter for RegimA Worldwide
entries.description: Setup for R3.14M+ revenue theft. First documented act in coordinated scheme. Attempted redirect of payments from Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

entries.title: Cloud IT Systems Removal Order
entries.description: Peter ordered Cloud IT systems removal, seizing infrastructure control from legitimate operators.

entries.title: Peter Orders Cloud IT Systems Removal
entries.description: Peter instructs removal of all cloud IT systems, systematic dismantling of cloud-based infrastructure as preparation for evidence destruction

entries.title: Server Missing from Office
entries.description: Physical server hardware disappears from office premises, potential evidence destruction or data harvesting in preparation for subsequent financial crimes

entries.title: Unauthorized Beneficiary Changes
entries.description: Exclusion of legitimate beneficiaries. Direct violation of trust obligations and beneficiary rights

entries.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
entries.description: Jacqui confronted Rynette regarding R1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate and keeping them would be profiting from proceeds of murder.

entries.title: Unauthorized Transfers (R850K+)
entries.description: R850,000+ unauthorized transfers. Direct evidence of financial authority abuse and theft. R850K+ included revenue from platform paid by UK company (28 months)
Jax confronts Rynette about R1,035,000 owed to ReZonance and Kayla's estate

entries.title: Shopify Audit Trail Hijacking
entries.description: CRITICAL EVENT: R1M+ monthly revenue → R0 (100% business shutdown). Central evidence destruction event proving consciousness of guilt. Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid, operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023 - proves RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream. Orders removed from Shopify following Jacqui's confrontation.

entries.title: Domain Registration (Identity Fraud)
entries.description: Customer hijacking platform. Family conspiracy escalation and digital impersonation. Domain registered to impersonate business on Dan's UK-funded platform. New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown.

entries.title: Daniel Finalizes Fraud Reports
entries.description: Daniel finalized reports uncovering fraud after using time from March 30 deadline extension

entries.title: Daniel Sends Comprehensive Reports to Bantjies
entries.description: Daniel sends comprehensive documentation to Bantjies including listing of all companies, Shopify store operations, and preliminary reports, demonstrating full transparency

entries.title: Secret Card Cancellations
entries.description: Secret cancellation of cards to sabotage Daniel's ability to pay creditors. Rynette may have opened 8 ABSA accounts using Daniel's stolen card.

entries.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
entries.description: CRITICAL EVENT: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud. Audit would have discovered R5.4M stock adjustment fraud and systematic inter-company manipulation. Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and protection of fraud scheme.

entries.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
entries.description: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure (June 6), demonstrating consciousness of guilt and conflict of interest given R18.685M debt to trust
Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure

entries.title: Bantjies Learns of Criminal Matters
entries.description: Daniel reports to Bantjies about Kayla's murder (August 2023) and Peter stealing funds after murder, including over R1.8M owed to Rezonance. Bantjies acquires knowledge of criminal matters before signing confirmatory affidavit.
Bantjes email confirms R10M bank balance decline year-on-year; first-ever substantial trading loss in RegimA Group history
evidence: Email: The RegimA Group results and Computer Expense analysis (2025-06-10)

entries.title: Systematic Trust Violations
entries.description: Trustee misconduct and self-dealing. Clear evidence of trustee misconduct and self-dealing

entries.title: Email Impersonation Pattern and Domain Switch Instruction
entries.description: R3.1M+ losses enabled by email control. Pattern of impersonation supporting criminal conspiracy charges. Email control facilitated fraud related to platform paid by Dan's UK company since July 2023. Email from Gee in Aug explained to Jax that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email'.
evidence: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot

entries.title: Domain Switch Email Instruction
entries.description: Gee instructed to send email: 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email', active customer diversion to fraudulent domain owned by Adderory
evidence: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot

entries.description: RegimaSA 2019 financial statements prepared and issued by Marisca Meyer, 6+ years after period end
entries.legal_significance: Document preparation timing suggests response to legal proceedings; establishes Peter's directorship and control

entries.title: Coordinated Fund Diversions
entries.description: Complex financial flow manipulation. Evidence of sophisticated financial crime coordination. Fund diversions targeted revenue from infrastructure continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd

entries.title: Warehouse POPI Violations
entries.description: Complete operational shutdown. Documented evidence of systematic business destruction. Shutdown of operations for platform continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd (28 months)

entries.title: Account Manipulation
entries.description: Financial control seizure. Documented evidence of financial system abuse and unauthorized control. Control seized over accounts receiving Shopify revenue from Dan's UK-paid platform
RegimA WWD Sage accounting registration expired; Rynette Farrar controls reactivation

entries.title: Trust Asset Misappropriation
entries.description: Trust property theft. Documented theft of trust property and breach of fiduciary duty

entries.title: Trust Breach Evidence
entries.description: Complete compromise of trust integrity. Systematic evidence of ongoing trust law violations

entries.title: Settlement Agreement Signed
entries.description: Settlement agreement signed 2 days before interdict filing, demonstrating strategic coordination and timing to create leverage
Bantjies certifies Peter's affidavit as Commissioner of Oaths despite material omissions

entries.title: Peter Files Founding Affidavit with Material Non-Disclosures
entries.description: Peter files founding affidavit containing material non-disclosures and perjury regarding email control, filed 2 days after settlement agreement

entries.title: Gee Email Explaining Domain Switch Instruction
entries.description: Email from Gee to Jax explaining that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email' on June 20, 2025. Confirms customer hijacking scheme.

entries.title: Financial Evidence Concealment
entries.description: Cover-up operations demonstrating guilt. Consciousness of guilt through evidence destruction attempts. Cover-up attempt to conceal fact that RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream - all revenue from Dan's UK-funded Shopify platform

entries.title: ENS Africa Acknowledges Criminal Matters Then Suppresses
entries.description: ENS Africa acknowledges receipt of criminal matters information with 'Received, thanks Daniel' email, then suppresses this information from Court

entries.title: Accounts Emptied
entries.description: Accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage

timeline.title: R63M Formal Demand by Ian Levitt Attorneys
